title: OneDrive Links stopped opening
content: OneDrive links recently stopped opening (browser tab shows the OneDrive icon but the page shows no content); Edge continues to open the links. I am running Firefox 99.0.1 (64 bit desktop).
creator: rhuitric

title: Cannot sign in to Firefox Sync
content: Hi. I was running into issues with my bookmarks menu bar not showing up. I tried hiding it and re-showing it. Didn't work. I restarted my computer. Still the same. So I uninstalled Firefox. After re-installing it, I tried to log in to my Firefox account to sync everything, but the sign in button just turns into a spinning wheel and above my profile picture and email address, it says "working...". It is just stuck like that. I've tried quitting out and doing it again. Still the same. I restarted my computer as well. Still the same. How can I fix this?
creator: lg.stephy

title: Log in problems on 3rd party websites
content:
On certain websites I notices I have 'unknown errors' when trying to log in.

Usually this is remedied by either using Chrome or clearing cookies and the cache.

Both of there are inconvenient and result in a great deal of wasted time.

The usual response by these websites is "get Mozilla to fix this".

I'm getting sick of this.

I don't want to switch to Chrome but I will have to if this persists.
creator: dominicpukallus

title: What is this TV Search window  in Firefox. It appears on opening browser and has no x button
content: Explain what the TV Search add-on is about, and how I cancel it.
creator: vjpcorbett

title: Maximum tabs to send
content:
How many tabs that is allowed to send to another device?

I'm trying to move my tabs from my laptop to my PC but it only send 105 tabs while I want to send all the 213 tabs. Even after sending the first 105 tabs, I'm unable to send anymore tabs.

Is there a way to send more than that?
creator: spec.b

title: Firefox at startup
content:
G'day,

The attached image is my task manager which shows as being resource hungry for Firefox.....Firefox(9) @ approx 500MB.

This was taken immediately after desktop was rebooted.... nothing else started up....no other users having previous access....ie immediately after reboot

Are the nine sessions normal?

Firefox response time is also slow.

Any suggestions?

Thanks
creator: apjfenech

title: Cuando uso el Navegador Firefox mi Mac no se apaga, se reinicia
content: Cuando utilizo Firefox mi computadora no se apaga. Cuando intento apagarla, tarda mucho tiempo y finalmente se reinicia.
creator: mirabalphotography
